v8:item.v8:content: Welcome to the data exchange creation wizard
The wizard allows you to create a new data exchange with another infobase.
Wizard run mode choice switch group
Wizard run mode choice switch group
Specify the file name with saved data exchange settings, that was saved during setup in first infobase:
Specify the name of file with data exchange settings, that was saved during the first infobase setup.
Empty exchange settings file selection page
Empty exchange settings file selection page
Settings file and exchange message pictures
Settings file and exchange message pictures
File with settings for second infobase.
Exchange message file for second infobase.
Click "Next" button to start configuring exchange over the local or network directory.
Wizard page start exchange with service setup
Welcome to the data exchange creation wizard
Specify parameters of connection to the application over the Internet
Click "Next" button to start configuring the data exchange.
Wizard page data exchange setup parameter
Wizard page data exchange setup parameter
Click "Next" button to start configuring the data mapping.
Wizard page data exchange parameter setup
Click "Next" button to start data mapping.
Mapping state there is unmapped data
Mapping state there is unmapped data

Because the data input is performed in both applications, the data mapping should be executed. This will allow to avoid the duplication of catalog items, that were created independently in both applications, for example, with the same descriptions. The data mapping allows to specify, which data is the same in both applications.
All data mapped. Go next to continue setup.
Click "Next" button to start the data synchronization.
Enable all event writing to event log group
Enable all event writing to event log group
Writing events to event log allows to locate problems in the data exchange.
Click "Finish" button to close the setup wizard.
Settings for adding document data to accounting records
Values for filling document attributes during import in this information base:
Values for filling document attributes during import in application located in the Internet:
Click "Next" button to start the data synchronization.
Wizard page wizard run mode choice
Wizard page wizard run mode choice
Connect to the second infobase directly
Connect to the second infobase over the Internet
Connect to the second infobase using ordinary communication channels
Picture for exchange over external connection
Picture for exchange over the external connection
Picture for exchange over web service
Picture for exchange over web service
Picture for exchange over ordinary communication channels
Picture for exchange over ordinary communication channels
On this computer or on a computer in the local network
Click "Next" button to start configuring additional parameters of the data exchange.
Click "Next" button to start configuring the data exchange.
Click "Next" button to start configuring various transport types of data exchange.
Wizard page set transport parameters FILE
Wizard page set transport parameters FILE
Specify settings for exchange over local or network directory.
Specify a directory on 1C:Enterprise server or a network directory, that can be accessed from 1C:Enterprise server.
Click "Next" button to start configuring the data exchange over FTP resource.
Wizard page set transport parameters FTP
Wizard page set transport parameters FTP
Specify settings of exchange over FTP resource.
Set exchange message password group FTP
Set exchange message password group FTP
Click "Next" button to start configuring the data exchange over email.
Wizard page set transport parameters EMAIL
Wizard page set transport parameters EMAIL
Specify setting of the data exchange over email.
Click "Next" button to start configuring additional parameters of data exchange.
Exchange over local or network directory
Click "Next" button to review data exchange creation parameters preview and create the data exchange.
Wizard page second setup stage parameter setup
Wizard page second setup stage parameter setup
Exchange over local or network directory
Click "Next" button to review data exchange creation parameters preview and create the data exchange.
Wizard page first infobase external connection parameter setup
Data exchange parameter setup for this infobase
Click "Next" button to start configuring data exchange parameters for second infobase.
Wizard page second infobase external connection parameter setup
Data exchange parameter setup for second infobase
Click "Next" button to review data exchange creation parameters preview and create the data exchange.
Everything is ready to create the data exchange
The data exchange will be created with following parameters:
Mapping wizard opened info label group
Mapping wizard opened info label group
After the data exchange creation is completed, the interactive data exchange creation wizard will be opened.
Wizard page end with settings export
The first stage of setup successfully completed
To complete the data exchange setup, the file with settings for second infobase should be saved. During running second stage of this wizard in second base, you will be asked to specify this file:
Execute data export for mapping page
Execute data export for mapping page

Right after the data exchange setup is completed, it will be possible to import data to second infobase and specify, which objects are the same in two exchanging infobases.
Also the data export could be performed later, using the list of data exchanges.
Execute subordinate node image initial creation page
Execute subordinate node image initial creation page
The initial image of the subordinate node of distributed infobase will be created. The initial image is exported to the infobase, that is created during the initial image creation.
Enable all event writing to event log group
Enable all event writing to event log group
Writing events to event log allows to locate problems in the data exchange.
Click "Finish" button to close this wizard.
Wizard page end with exchange over external connection

Right after the data exchange setup is completed, it will be possible to specify, which objects are the same in two exchanging infobases and import data.
Also the data import can be performed in second infobase. For this open the link below.
Enable all events writing to event log group
Enable all events writing to event log group
Writing events to event log allows to locate problems in the data exchange.
Click "Finish" button to close this wizard.

Executing unloading data from this program. You Are , Welcome...
Executing checking setting connection c application in Online. You Are , Welcome...

Checking the connection to the second infobase. Please wait...

Execute data import in this infobase

Correspondent infobase node default values are available

Event log message text: creating a data exchange

Number of objects to map, pcs
